#RElevatingSREITB

SOCIETY OF RENEWABLE ENERGY


ABOUT
SRE ITB

Society of Renewable Energy (SRE) is a student-led organization that aims to spark student’s role in the field of new and renewable energy.

SRE Institut Teknologi Bandung, the first SRE student chapter, was born in 2019 to accelerate Indonesia’s energy transition by providing some learning programs and project implementation for the members.

With More Than

2000+ Members

We are currently spread across

40+ Universites

WHAT WILL WE DO AT SRE ITB?


REview

Webinar series to learn the fundamental of renewable energy

Social Project

A community service projecy to help disadvantages individuals

RE PRoject

Renewable energy installation project

Career Talks

Talk show with renewable enery expert regarding green jobs

External Event

External events from SRE national where we can meet with other SRE chapter

Skill Training

Soft skill workshop session as preparation before doing final project

Gathering

One day event where members will get together and doing fun games

Company Visit

One day visit to renewable energy company
